aka: Thirteen Days: Roots of the Cuban Missile Crisis
this_title: Roots of the Cuban Missile Crisis
trans_title: Thirteen Days: Roots of the Cuban Missile Crisis
introduction: This is a documentary about the historical context of the Cuban Missile Crisis, that is available on the DVD for the film 'Thirteen Days' (2000).Using archival footage and new interviews with a wide range of experts, Director/Producer, Alita Holly explores the events that lead up to the crisis, as well as the people involved.
foreign_title: Roots of the Cuban Missile Crisis
